column1: Art Institute of Chicago////I love coming here!  All the art displayed is so incredible.  I used to come here a lot when I was little for school field trips and I thought it was
column3: boring.  Now that I can actually appreciate the art
column4: I wish I could come here more often.  You can spend so much time here looking at all the beautiful artwork
column5: and it's insane how all those pieces were created sooo long ago.  It's really amazing!
